name: Somaiya Sports Academy
tagline: Building Champions On and Off the Court
description: Somaiya Sports Academy in Mumbai provides a vibrant basketball program for young athletes and adults. With professional coaches, structured training programs, and world-class indoor and outdoor courts, the academy nurtures talent and promotes fitness through the sport of basketball.

contact.address: Somaiya Vidyavihar Campus, Vidyavihar East, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400077

highlights: Youth development leagues and inter-school tournaments

courses.title: Beginner Basketball Training
courses.description: Fundamental skills for kids including dribbling, shooting, and passing.
courses.schedule: Mon, Wed, Fri - 5:00 PM to 6:30 PM

courses.title: Intermediate Training Program
courses.description: Focus on advanced drills, teamwork, and game tactics.
courses.schedule: Tue, Thu, Sat - 6:00 PM to 7:30 PM

courses.title: Elite Training & League Prep
courses.description: High-intensity training for advanced players preparing for competitive leagues.
courses.schedule: Mon to Fri - 7:00 AM to 8:30 AM

instructors.name: Coach Anil Deshmukh
instructors.bio: Coach Anil has worked with school and college teams across Mumbai and guided several players into state-level tournaments.

instructors.name: Priya Nair
instructors.bio: Priya has trained both male and female athletes, focusing on injury prevention and performance enhancement.

facilities.name: Indoor Basketball Court
facilities.description: Wooden flooring with FIBA-approved dimensions and lighting.

facilities.name: Outdoor Multi-Purpose Court
facilities.description: Synthetic flooring suitable for tournaments and recreational play.

facilities.name: Strength & Conditioning Gym
facilities.description: Equipped with modern fitness equipment tailored for basketball athletes.

facilities.name: Video Analysis Room
facilities.description: Sessions recorded and analyzed to track individual progress.

achievements: Winners of Mumbai Inter-Academy Basketball Tournament 2022
10+ players selected for Maharashtra State Team
Recognized by Mumbai District Basketball Association

policies.cancellation: 48 hours advance notice required for class cancellation
policies.payment: Quarterly advance payment. Refunds not permitted after start of course
policies.trial: Free 1-hour trial session available for new students
policies.attendance: Minimum 75% attendance required for participation in tournaments
